__e: Whoa, look at that! My blood's a genius. Fancy Roman numerals and everything.
I understood where I stood in relation to where the Romans and the Jews were 2000 years ago and why I was here now.
If you can do miracles, call upon God to send hosts to destroy the Romans and free our people from bondage.
We will have vengeance for what the Romans have done.
The Romans found out what a handful could do... if it's the right handful.
The Romans killed people and saved billions more from disease, war, famine and barbarism.
